Job Description: We are seeking a motivated web applications developer to design, code and debug web applications under a multi-tiered platform.    Primary focus is on web development including dynamic pages, web services and database CRUD operations.     This individual will be involved in all aspects of the development process for external and internal use.      Job Requirement:       4+ years of experience in web development.       Proficient developing web applications using ColdFusion 2011 and above using cfcomponent, cffunction, cfquery, structures, arrays etc.       Experience with MVC framework like Mach-II, ColdBox etc.       3+ years of experience with HTML5, JavaScript, JQuery, AJAX, CSS 3 and related technologies.       3+ years of experience with SQL (MS SQL, Oracle, MySQL or any other).       Should be able to write Stored Procedures, Functions and Views joining multiple tables.       Experience writing and invoking web services.       Experience with responsive web design.       Experience with multi-tier web architecture.       Experience working with Java, C#, PHP will be a huge plus.       Experience with .Net development a plus.       Experience working with third party tools like dhtmlx is a big plus.       Good communication, interpersonal skills and a team player.       Worked in an Agile/Scrum environment to deliver high quality software.
